select a.id as a_id, a.title as a_title, a.address as a_address, a.overview as a_overview, a.latitude as a_latitude, a.longitude as a_longtitue, CONCAT('/', i.folder_name, '/', i.image_name) as main_image_path from attraction a left outer join image_info i on a.id = i.attraction_id
and a.title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
and a.sidoCode = #{sidoCode}
and a.gugunCode = #{gugunCode}
and i.is_representative = true
order by a.id desc limit #{start}, #{sizePerPage}
insert into attraction (type, title, address, sido_code, gugun_code, overview, latitude, longitude) values (#{type}, #{title}, #{address}, #{sidoCode}, #{gugunCode}, #{overview}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})

insert into keyword_match (attraction_id, keyword_code) values
(#{id}, #{item})
